d87c927c-1d85-43b6-b9ec-1b4ead1b7a3f.name: Medical Doctor
d87c927c-1d85-43b6-b9ec-1b4ead1b7a3f.notes: Requires attending an accredited medical school, regardless of skill, and may require residency or internship.

e91c2005-5fdd-41cb-9e74-eab682b471bc.name: Assistant Engineer's License
e91c2005-5fdd-41cb-9e74-eab682b471bc.notes: Requires any two of the Mechanic specializations

35f0df32-b932-46c6-9d21-3e7a195d5560.name: Chief Engineer's License
35f0df32-b932-46c6-9d21-3e7a195d5560.notes: 8 total points in Mechanic (Jump Drive, Maneuver Drive, Power Plant, Starship) and Engineer (Starship)

ec2e769d-ce50-45d5-a76d-8d7f7677f65e.name: Master's License
ec2e769d-ce50-45d5-a76d-8d7f7677f65e.notes: Must not have a non-Secret debilitating psychological disadvantage.  8 points in Administration, Navigation (Hyperspace), Law, Piloting (High-Performance Spaceship), Spacer, Shiphandling (Starship)
